info.title: Cloud PKI Management
info.description: Take back control of your Microsoft Public Key Infrastructure (ADCS) with the Microsoft Power Platform and Cloud PKI Management from 509 Solutions.

parameters.name: timevalid
parameters.description: Certificates that are still time valid

parameters.name: expiring
parameters.description: Certificates expiring in the next days. (Min=1 Max=180)

parameters.name: serialnumber
parameters.description: Serial Number of the certificate to query for

parameters.name: ski
parameters.description: Subject Key Identifier of the certificates to query for

parameters.name: aki
parameters.description: Authority Key Identifier of the certificates to query for

parameters.name: keytype
parameters.description: Public Key Algorithm Type to search for

parameters.name: keylength
parameters.description: Public Key Length of the certificates to query for

parameters.name: owneremail
parameters.description: Email Address of Certificate Owners to query certificates for

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: Select Version 1 (Server 2000), Version 2 (Server 2003 Enterprise), Version 3 (Server 2008 Standard), Version 4 (Server 2012 Standard)

parameters.name: min-minkeylength
parameters.description: Minimum key lengths greater than or equal to eg.. 512

parameters.name: max-minkeylength
parameters.description: Minimum key lengths less than or equal to eg.. 4096

parameters.name: min-validity
parameters.description: Certificates valid for at least "x" days eg.. 180

parameters.name: max-validity
parameters.description: Certificates valid for at most "x" days eg.. 180

post.description: A new hook has been added to this Cloud PKI deployment
A hook has been removed from this Cloud PKI deployment
A new certificate has been issued by the Certificate Authority
An existing certificate has been revoked by the Certificate Authority
An existing certificate's CloudPKI properties have been updated.
A certificate is expiring in 60 days
A certificate has expired.
A certificate is available for renewal.
A new certificate request is pending approval from a Certificate Manager
A certificate request has been approved for issuance by a Certificate Manager
A certificate request has been denied issuance by a Certificate Manager
An existing request's CloudPKI properties have been updated.
A certificate request has failed to be processed by the Certificate Authority
A certificate template has been published by the Certificate Authority
A certificate template has been unpublished by the Certificate Authority
A certificate template has been updated.
A new certificate revocation list (CRL) has been issued by the Certificate Authority
A new Cloud PKI Connector action has been Added.
An action executed by the Cloud PKI Connector has completed.
An action executed by the Cloud PKI Connector has failed.
An action executed by the Cloud PKI Connector has stalled.
